entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
